description: Pixel is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With its classic box design, retro console buttons, and cat-inspired arms and legs, Pixel combines a nostalgic aesthetic with modern functionality. Its screen, also adorned with a cute cat design, displays waveforms and data with precision. As a member of WebtrES, Pixel excels in web development and digital signal processing, showcasing its intelligence and dexterity. With its charming appearance and excellent technical skills, Pixel is a valuable asset to the club.
name: Pixel
